Holiday Money Get in touch Book a video call Make an enquiry Call 0800 713 715 Help Get in touch Back View gallery / Back Mekong Delta Hanoi Angkor Wat - Cambodia Vietnam Vietnam & Cambodia Explorer - with Wide Eyed Tours &vert; 13 Nights • 14 day tour • Meals as specified Overview Inclusions Terms & Conditions VIETNAM & CAMBODIA EXPLORER Embark on an unforgettable 14-day journey from Hanoi to Siem Reap with this meticulously crafted tour through Vietnam and Cambodia. Experience the bustling streets of Hanoi, the imperial city of Hue and the emerald waters of Ha Long Bay. Explore vibrant Saigon, the historic Cu Chi tunnels, the scenic Mekong Delta and journey onwards to the awe-inspiring Angkor Wat temples in Siem Reap. This itinerary promises an exciting blend of cultural immersion, natural beauty, and bucket-list experiences you’ll never forget. View more View less 13 nights + 14 day tour from $ 4720 per person share twin. Flights are additional Enquire now Sale Period : until sold out Deal Includes: 13 Nights Meals as specified (drinks are not included) English speaking local guides Tours and transfers as specified by private air-conditioned vehicles Hanoi Jeep Tour Ha Long Bay boat trip with meals Hue City tour Cooking Class Cu Chi Tunnels Tour Mekong Delta tour Phare Circus Tonle Sap Lake Tour Angkor Wat temple tour Domestic Economy Class flight from Hanoi to Hue Domestic Economy Class flight from Hoi An to Ho Chi Minh City International Economy Class flight from Ho Chi Minh City to Siem Reap Travel Dates & Pricing Select Departure Dates between 01 Nov 25 - 21 Dec 25, 03 Jan-13 Feb & 23 Feb-31 Aug 26 from $4720 per person family share Ask us about upgrading to 4 or 5 Star accommodation options International flights are additional Itinerary Day 1: Arrival day in Hanoi After your arrival at the airport a private transfer will take you to your hotel. Day 2: Hanoi Jeep City Tour Take a city tour in the morning, absorbing the highlights of this stimulating destination in a vintage military jeep. (B) Day 3: Ha Long Bay Cruise Leave the city excitement for an unforgettable two day cruise on Ha Long Bay’s tranquil waters, a World Heritage Site of outstanding natural beauty. (B,L,D) Day 4: Ha Long Bay & Flight to Hue Lunch will be served on your boat as you cruise back to the harbour before your return journey by coach to Hanoi. Transfer to the airport for your evening flight to Hue. (B, L) Day 5: Hue Motorbike Tour Today you will enjoy a thrilling day of sightseeing in the historical city of Hue from the back of a motorbike or by car. Visit the citadel, the last Emperor’s tomb, Thien Mu Pagoda and the beautiful countryside. Your tour includes a delicious vegetarian Buddhist lunch at a pagoda. (B) Day 6 : Travel from Hue to Hoi An Take the scenic mountainous route over the spectacular Hai Van Pass from Hue to the charming town of Hoi An. Spend the evening exploring this fascinating town which is teeming with tailors, colourful shops, galleries, funky restaurants and bars. (B) Days 7 & 8: Cooking Class & Free Day On day 7 enjoy the local flavours and tastes whilst taking part in a local cooking class. Spend the rest of your stay doing some of the many activities and tours Hoi An has to offer. (B, L) Day 9: Travel to Ho Chi Minh City Take a short flight to Ho Chi Minh City, the economic hub of Vietnam. Visit the former Viet Cong stronghold at the Cu Chi tunnels. (B) Day 10: A Day on the Mekong Delta Spend the day discovering the very best of the Mekong Delta, including local produce and the local culture. (B) Day 11: Flight to Siem Reap & Circus Fly to Siem Reap where you will have the day to relax. This evening you will be entertained in the big top by the unique Cambodian Phare Circus from A level seats. (B) Day 12: Beng Melea & Floating Village Explore the mysterious Beng Melea ruins, said to be the blueprint of Angkor Wat. After this you will hop on a local boat and explore a floating village on the Tonle Sap lake. (B) Day 13: Sunrise at Angkor Wat Watch the breath-taking sunrise over Angkor Wat, voted No.1 tourist attraction in the world in 2018. Take in the more historical sites, which include Angkor Thom, the Bayon temples and Ta Prohm. This evening you’ll hop on the back of a Vespa for a fabulous food tour around Siem Reap. Day 14: Siem Reap Departure Day Free time until your private transfer to the airport (B) B= Breakfast, L= Lunch, D= Dinner Terms & Conditions Valid for new bookings until sold out • Prices are correct as at 12 Sep 25 • Prices are thereafter subject to change without notice until time of confirmation • Prices may vary due to a number of factors including tax and surcharge increases, exchange rate movements and availability • Full payment is required at time of booking.• Share twin is based on 2 people sharing a room, bedding configurations may vary • Flights are additional. If additional accommodation is required due to flight schedules this is at customers own expense • Advertised prices are per person based on payment by cash or eftpos. Credit card fees will apply • Amendment and cancellation fees apply • Accommodation ratings are based on House of Travel ratings and are a guide only to the overall quality of the property. • Packages are subject to availability • Product is supplied by reputable suppliers with their own terms and conditions • Please ask your House of Travel consultant for full details.
